display_long_description:
Suit up and save the day in Project Demigod, a physics-driven superhero sandbox with limitless possibilities.

# The Ultimate Superhero Simulator Awaits

Pick from a huge range of classic and innovative powers including flight, strength, super speed and more. Head to a range of massive locations from sprawling cities to massive arenas and take on missions, fight waves of enemies and topple enormous bosses. The only question is: what type of hero do you want to be?

# Featuring:
* Over 40 Power Combinations: Change abilities on the fly and mix and match attacks. Shoot fire with one hand and electricity from the other. Wield weapons, climb skyscrapers, throw cars and much more.
[media]
* Missions, Bosses, and Sandboxes: Explore maps to find different mission types, including races and combat scenarios. Face off with giant monsters in gripping boss encounters. Or customize your settings and stage the comic book battles of your dreams. 
[media]
* Built-in Mod Support: Choose from a huge range of user-made content from the Mod.io menu. Become your favorite hero, face iconic enemies and even wield famous weapons. Upload your own creations and share them with others. [media]
* Much More To Come: An expanding roadmap of free updates is bringing new powers, locations, enemies, and more to the game on a regular basis. And, yes, multiplayer is due to arrive in the future. Check back often for updates.
